Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Otok Silba poznat još pod nazivom " vrata Dalmacije", nalazi se zapadno od Zadra. Veličina otoka je svega 15 kvadratnih kilometara i to je otok očuvane prirode, čistog mora na kojemu su zabranjeni automobili.Prodaje se novogradnja, što je rijetkost na tom otoku, na parceli od 600 m2.Kuća koja je zamišljena kao dvojni objekt, te ju čine 2 odvojena stana. Mogućnost kupnje samo jednog stana ( pola kuće), cijena jednog stana: 320.000 €.Svaki stan je veličine 92 m2 netto površine ( cca 97 m2 brutto površine). Svakom stanu pripada i okućnica od 230 m2.Prizemlje: dnevni boravak ( 21.50 m2), kuhinja i blagovaona ( 11,25 m2), ulaz ( 3,15 m2), wc ( 1,95 m2), spremište ( 2, 95 m2), terasa ( 15,65 m2) i dvorište cca 225 m2.Kat: hodnik ( 3,05 m2), stubište ( 3,45 m2), soba 1 ( 9, 75 m2), soba 2 ( 10, 75 m2), soba 3 ( 8, 15 m2) i kupaonica ( 4,45 m2).Svakom stanu pripada spremnik za vodu od 40 kubika zapremnine.Lokacija kuće je odlična, udaljena od plaže svega 240 m i od centra mjesta 400m.Agencijska provizija iznosi 3 % + PDV.The island of Silba, also known as the "gate of Dalmatia", is located west of Zadar. The size of the island is only 15 square kilometers and it is an island of preserved nature, clean sea where cars are prohibited.New construction for sale, which is a rarity on that island, on a plot of 600 m2.The house, which was conceived as a double building, consists of 2 separate apartments.Each apartment has a size of 92 m2 net area (approx. 97 m2 gross area). Each apartment has a garden of 230 m2.Ground floor: living room (21.50 m2), kitchen and dining room (11.25 m2), entrance (3.15 m2), toilet (1.95 m2), storage room (2.95 m2), terrace (15.65 m2) and yard approx. 225 m2.Floor: hallway (3.05 m2), staircase (3.45 m2), room 1 (9.75 m2), room 2 (10.75 m2), room 3 (8.15 m2) and bathroom (4.45 m2).Each apartment has a 40 cubic meter water tank.The location of the house is excellent, only 240 m2 from the beach and 400 m from the town center.Agency commission is 3% + VAT.
